Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: A hidden beer lovers treasure with a charming barman.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: If you like beer, this a great option for you near Asmterdam Central Station. Their variety of beers is large, including bottles, cans or draft beer. The bartenders are good at suggesting the beer that is closer to your taste. Also, they ‚Ä¶

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Victor was the best!! We highly recommend this place, it was a whole new experience. We went for a beer and we fell in love with it!

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Fantastic little bar, wonderfully friendly and knowledgeable staff to help you navigate the extensive menu. ‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Great place with wide beer selection.  Enjoyed the location (5 minute walk to/from Amsterdam Central). Jacob's service made the visit double great!  I look forward to making this a stop on my next trip.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: This is an authentic bar that serves an amazing collection of craft beer. Contrary to all the tourist traps around it, this place was quiet and the service was very helpful. Every beer recommendation was too notch! Happy, thank you, more please!

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Cozy atmosphere, classic brown caf√©, good selection of beer and a person behind the bar that actually knows your taste, what do you want more? I can highly recommend this place, besides just for one drink it's also perfect after work when you have to leave with the train because it's so close to Central station.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Great spot to grab a craft beer while you figure out where to eat dinner.  Nice relaxed vibe, excellent selection of beers, friendly staff.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Great selection of beers. A lot of Belgian on draft. Friendly and helpful staff. A must if you're in the area!

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: We always visit this bar in n Amsterdam.  Always a nice crowd and a great beer selection.  My favorite place to take a break from the crowds and enjoy the scenery.  Alot of history...Owner is very welcoming and friendly

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text:
Easily one of the nicest hosts in the city.
The ambience is that of a rustic bar, nice wooden surfaces and charming, low volume music in the background. ‚Ä¶

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Really chill place to be with friend or collegues. Lot's of beer on most of them are belgian beer.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Seriously, if you're looking for a bar with an awesome manager who knows his beers and who can lead you through an awesome evening after a great day in this great city: THIS is the place to be. ‚Ä¶

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: So glad I popped into this bar. Had my first Trappist beer! Great manager with knowledge of beer, relaxing atmosphere. Want to make it here regularly if possible.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Great place for craft beers, enjoyed several Amsterdam brewed examples. Bar man was very knowledgeable.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Real good selection of craft beer well worth a visit.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Very nice pub with a really wide choice of belgian beers.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Loved this place, beer cafe, small & intimate. Recommended to us. Bar person REALLY knew her beer, fab selection, made some great recommendations. Made us feel very. welcome. Great way to spend a (very) wet afternoon.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Cozy bar, with great staff and great beer

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Awesome beer selection. Great ambience. Lovely staff.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Niamh poured a great beer and kept the craic flowing last year in between the lockdowns etc. Great wee bar with many beers, in the Golum collection of bars.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Came here really late on a Friday night for some good beers. The bartender was a super friendly American guy who had been living in Amsterdam for years. He was incredibly friendly and helpful and went out of his way to get a weird creepy guy away from our group and out of the bar. Best bartender I've encountered in Amsterdam!

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Amazing little place! Great beers and very knowledgeable, super friendly staff.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: If you are looking for a cozy, warm and friendly bar, this is the place to go. An amazing collection of beers that you could only have dreamt of until now. They also serve a great cheese platter if you are looking for an accompanying bite.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Great little bar! Awesome American bar man with all the knowledge and advice to help you find some tasty beers that will suit your taste. Definitely worth a visit. Didn‚Äôt try the cheese board, but that looked pretty good too!

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Great place! Wide selection of beers on tap, especially Belgian style ales (including Kwak!). The bar itself is cozy with seats at carpeted tables in the back. The staff is friendly and accommodating. I thoroughly enjoyed my two visits here.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Same owner as Gollem, so most beers you find at Gollem can be found here too. Bartender is friendly and very knowledgeable. Place can get quite busy and loud on evening but the experience has been good for me. Place has its own character, ‚Ä¶

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: One of my favorite places for a beer in the centrum. The staff are friendly and the beer selection is very good. It's a cozy interior with real character. It seems to always have a nice mix of locals and tourists... at least the tourist that know the simple pleasures in life. :)

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Lovely pub with loads of beer options. Friendly barman made us feel very welcome. Would recommend for beer lovers and anyone fancying a nice chilled drink in a relaxed non-touristy atmosphere.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: One of my favourite bars in Amsterdam. Impressive beer selection, friendly service, rad music & a relaxed, mixed crowd. This place is small & it gets really full, so don't be one of 'those' people who tries to come here with a group.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Fantastic bar with a huge selection of beers on tap or bottled. Have the cheese plate served with mustard and a apple jam and ask for recommendations from the fantastic bar tender Jonathan he really knows what he's talking about.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: As usual found a great place on our last day. If you dont like great beers , great service , great relaxed atmosphere , this isn't for you. John , the barman , really knows his stuff. It's the same old story , you find somewhere on the last ‚Ä¶

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Great choice of beers, awesome atmosphere and friendly bartenders.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: The bartender knows his stuff ...  beer recommendations were good üëåüèΩüôåüèΩ

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Nice bar. Interior is quite new mixing the traditional Dutch ' bruin caf√©' with an Irish Pub twist. Friendly staff and obvisiously very clean glasses and barplates. Side range of speciale beers. Recommended.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Great pub. Great service. Plenty of choice

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: For years this has been my favorite place in Amsterdam!! Amazing selection of beers and great people.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: I think this bar deserves a five star rating, but the owner only takes Dutch credit cards and cash. Cash only is normal in the Dam, but Dutch cards only? Too bad. This place is something special. ‚Ä¶

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: The best beer selection and service you will find in the city.   This place is a must stop even if you only have one day.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Best beer bar ever. Not so crowded over the night, friendly staff and a quite huge range of different beers. We liked it very much and would come back on our next journey to Amsterdam.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Nice bar. Huge variety of good draft beers.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Awesome pub with a great selection of beers. Knowledgeable and friendly staff. Have made many repeat visits, as very handy for central station.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: One of my personal favourites in Amsterdam. Fantastic beers (including Oedipus and Gollem), great music (including the god-like Rory Gallagher, Led Zeppelin and The Beatles) and friendly staff.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Great beer selection highlighting Belgian,  Netherlands beers with a spattering of American ipas. This was recently purchased by the Gollem people. Only place i've found that consistently has Boerken and boerinneken,  two of my favorite Belgians, one a  Belgian dark ale,  another a tripel

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: This is a decent bar, if you like different beers then you will like it here more than me as they have a large selection.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Nice atmosphere and very friendly German bartender with helpful suggestions.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Great selection of beer and a great atmosphere. If you're claustrophobic, it's probably not for you. Otherwise, enjoy the crowd and a few draft beers.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Authentic Amsterdam pub drinking experience. Very wide variety of craft beers and the only play I've seen with an accordion for people to play with it. Highly recommended.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Amazing beer selection inc 4 gueze and many other sours,+ over 100 more inc 16 on tap.  Great bar for any beer lover.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Favourite pub in Amsterdam. Great selection of beer with some really nice stuff on tap. And, they play Bad Religion on their playlist.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text:
Fantastic selection of Ales.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Good selection of Belgian beers, chill vibe. I came here alone to relax and grab a drink alone after dinner. I'll be coming back more times while I'm here.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Relaxed place to drink a beer and to have a conversation. Clean, decent, no hard music. Don't expect much from the staff on saturday. Inexperienced, insecure and incapable.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Cosy and possible to bring dogs inside. Great Belgian beer selection. Piano available. Friendly staff. One of my favorite pubs in Amsterdam.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Awesome choices of great beer and a really friendly bar-person!

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Het Eflde Gebod! great tiny Belgian bar with a big list of beers on tap and bottle. Importantly very close to Amsterdam centraal and accepts visa now since Golem took over. Same great OLD SCHOOL vibe as ever.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod

Name: Het Elfde Gebod

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: The friendliest stuff ever. Locals seem to love it. Must visit place if you want a quiet drunk in a comfortable and friendly atmosphere

Name: Het Elfde Gebod

Name: Het Elfde Gebod

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Nice little beer bar that I would like to revisit. We were there later in the afternoon, and the only people around. I'm sure it gets busy in the evenings.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
Review Text: Clearly a winner with an eerie atmosphere and a grand selection of ale. The intimacy at 2 in the morning was chilling with a soft music in the background and a great memory of an anniversary.

Name: Het Elfde Gebod

Name: Het Elfde Gebod

Name: Het Elfde Gebod
